ne10:21.1: udakarahade → udakadahe (mr) | gambhīre → gambhīraṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ne10:23.2: sakkharakaṭhalaṁ → sasakkharakaṭhalaṁ (bj); sakkharā vā kathalā vā (pts-vp-pli1); sakkharā vā kathalā (mr); sakkharā vā kaṭhalā (csp1ed sn42.6:1 [6. Asibandhakaputtasutta])
ne10:23.4: adho gaccha → avaṁ gaccha (bj, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
